name: Munily
headline: Access control management app for Latam√Ç¬¥s gated communities
description:
There are three key roles among a community:

The security Guard
The resident 
The administrator 

When a visitor tries to access a designated community, the security guard must require an ID previously to allow entry. 

He proceeds to communicate with a specific resident through a intercom which is almost always broken or under repair, delaying the visitor√¢¬Ä¬ôs entry to the compound 

WE come in, by interconnecting the security guard with the resident and the administrators through an app and a tablet we provide to make all the process of access pretty smooth and easy.

When a visitor comes in, the security guard must only:

Take a picture of its ID, using the tablet, 
Select the apartment, so the resident receives a pop up notification through which they can deny or approve the access. 

Last but not least, An even easier way has been developed by Munily which utilizes QR codes generated through Whatsapp. Which visitors just show and security guards scan to allow entry.

founders.name: Marwa Hage, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CCO of Munily App | PropTech Entrepreneur | Women Empowerment | Community Building | Writer | TEDx Organizer | Speaker

founders.name: Khaled Alhaj, Founder
founders.description: CEO of Munily App - Panama City

founders.name: Mitchell Contreras, Founder
founders.description: I enjoy solving problems. I like listening to people's experiences and being able to make the most of their experiences

founders.name: carlos de la guardia, Founder
founders.description: Carlos is a second-time entrepreneur currently COO at Munily where he and his team are making Latam residential communities more secure and connected.

## ¬øQu√© dicen los medios de nosotros?
![comillas-arriba](https://munily.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/comillas-arriba.svg)

Una idea que est√° revolucionando el mercado de las aplicaciones y que conecta a los residentes de conjuntos residenciales, edificios, barriadas, entre otros, es Munily, plataforma dise√±ada para mejorar la comunicaci√≥n, seguridad y gesti√≥n entre los residentes y guardias de la propiedad.
![logo-cnn](https://munily.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/logo-cnn.png)
Munily es una aplicaci√≥n que les permite a quienes viven en conjuntos residenciales administrar el ingreso de visitantes desde sus tel√©fonos celulares. Adem√°s, es una de las 34 innovaciones latinoamericanas apoyadas por la aceleradora Y Combinator.

generated_description:
**Munily**: Revolutionizing Access Control in Gated Communities

Founded in 2019 and based in Panama City, Panama, Munily is an innovative proptech company focused on access control management for gated communities in Latin America. The company emerged from a common challenge faced by many residential complexes: streamlining the entry process for visitors while enhancing communication between security guards, residents, and administrators.

### Problem Solved:
Traditionally, when a visitor arrives at a gated community, the security guard had to manually verify their identity through an unreliable intercom system, often leading to delays and frustration. Munily addresses this by connecting all parties through a dedicated app and tablet. With Munily, the check-in process becomes straightforward:
1. The security guard scans the visitor's ID using a tablet.
2. They select the resident‚Äôs apartment, triggering a notification to the resident.
3. The resident can easily approve or deny access through the app.
For added convenience, Munily has even implemented QR codes that visitors can show for quick entry, making the process smoother than ever.

### Features and Functionality:
Munily‚Äôs app is more than just a visitor management tool. It includes several modules that cater to different aspects of community management:
- **Security**: Digital records, fast entry via QR codes, panic buttons, and virtual intercoms.
- **Communication**: Mass notifications, resident-to-resident messaging, and administrative voting.
- **Billing and Collections**: Automated billing, reminders for overdue payments, and access to financial reports.
- **Reservations**: Easy management of common area bookings with metrics tracking.
- **Services Marketplace**: Residents can purchase various community services and goods directly from the app.

### Background and Recognition:
Munily is part of Y Combinator's Summer 2022 Batch, a prestigious accelerator that supports early-stage startups. It currently boasts a team of 30 dedicated employees and has gained positive media attention, being recognized for its role in digitalizing community management across Latin America, especially with its recent expansion into Colombia.

### Conclusion:
If you're looking for a tool that simplifies community management while enhancing security and communication, check out Munily. It's not just about managing access; it's about creating a seamless community experience. For more information, visit their website [here](https://munily.com/#/).
